EntitySets.Name: ExternalLearningEvents
EntitySets.Description: Collection of external learning events for user operations

Properties.Name: eventID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the external learning event

Properties.Name: title
Properties.Description: Title of the external learning event

Properties.Name: completionDate
Properties.Description: Date when the external learning was completed

Properties.Name: totalHours
Properties.Description: Total hours for the external learning

Properties.Name: description
Properties.Description: Description of the external learning event
